title: Build your own XP OEM install CD
description:
Do you have a branded PC(HP, Compaq, Gateway, ect...), tired of reloading Windows with all the crap that came with it?

With this kit you can create a CD to install a clean version of windows.

All you need is a PC with a valid license(and product key) and for it to have an I386 directory in either the root( ie; C:\) or in the C:\Windows directory.


Warning: this makes a clean install CD, more than likely you will have to go to your PC makers website and download the drivers, also, you will have to activate Windows but that wont be a problem if you&#039;re using a clean license(and product key).

There is a PDF file in this torrent that gives step by step instrutions, you might want to download it first.

The kit its self is in a non-passworded 7z archive.
